oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Field isotope investigations and numerical simulation of lake hydrodynamics
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MURTHY, JSR
KUMAR, US
NAVADA, SV
RAO, SM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: flow
3-d numerical free surface flow simulation model
environmental isotopes
hydrodynamics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A three-dimensional, numerical free-surface-flow simulation model is developed to investigate hydrodynamics of a lake and the predictive capabilities of the numerical model are validated by comparing them with field results obtained from Lake Naini, Uttar Pradesh, using environmental isotope (delta(18)O, deltaD and H-3) techniques. This has been carried out in order to understand the hydrodynamics of a lake (i.e. circulations, mixing and transport of water within the lake). Copyright (C) 2002 John Wiley Sons, Ltd.
